summary: Allows dis-enchanting of the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate.
descriptionHtml:
In the un-altered Dragonborn DLC, the Dwarven Black Bow of Fate's enchantment was not obtainable via dis-enchant (as opposed to the Champion's Cudgel and its enchantment of "Chaos Damage"). This mod allows players to obtain this enchantment as you would any other type of enchantment. The enchantment is titled "Chaos Absorb", to fit with the theme of the two enchantments.

Note: This mod requires the Dragonborn DLC, as well as the update needed to play it. As obvious as this might seem, I felt it needed to be stated in the description.
author: Zach the Unholy

files.name: Dwarven Black Bow of Fate Enchantment
